sentences.en: A visual tracking system driven by ultrasonic motors is designed.
sentences.cn: 设计了一种超声电机驱动的目标视觉跟踪系统.

sentences.en: Cracks can be detected by a method using ultrasonic waves.
sentences.cn: 疵点可用超声波方法检测.

sentences.en: Echo Sounder is a kind of acoustic measuring depth equipment, which can measure depth with the time between transmitted wave and echo on condition in which the speed of ultrasonic is fixed.
sentences.cn: 回声测深仪是用来测量水深的一种声学测量设备，其以水中超声波的传播速度为确定条件，利用发射波与反射回波时间差来测量水深。

sentences.en: Electromagnetic acoustic transducer ( EMAT ) is a new ultrasonic transmitting and receiving device.
sentences.cn: 电磁 超声换能器 是一种新型的超声波发射接收装置.

sentences.en: He measured the speed at which ultrasonic waves travel along the bone.
sentences.cn: 他测出了超声波穿过骨头的速度。

sentences.en: Modern medical technology like type-B ultrasonic checks can reveal the fetus gender.
sentences.cn: 现在的医疗仪器例如B超是可以分辨出胎儿的性别的。

sentences.en: Much as bats do, robots send out ultrasonic signals.
sentences.cn: 机器人就象蝙蝠那样地发出超声波讯号.

sentences.en: Now he feels much better after an ultrasonic shower.
sentences.cn: 他接受了一次超声波浴,现在感觉好多了.

sentences.en: Piezoelectric ceramic is used widely for ultrasonic fish finder.
sentences.cn: 压电陶瓷广泛应用于超声波鱼探仪.

sentences.en: Set up ultrasonic wire bonding laboratory.
sentences.cn: 成立超声波电子焊接实验室。

sentences.en: Some systems utilize other types of sensors, as thermal sensors, ultrasonic sensors.
sentences.cn: 某些系统使用其他型态的感测器, 例如热感测器 、 ultrasonic感测器等.

sentences.en: Sounds are classified into two kinds: sonic and ultrasonic.
sentences.cn: 声波分为两类, 即 普通声波与超声波.

sentences.en: The construct, driving principle and output performances of the cylinder type ultrasonic motor with multi-degree of freedom were presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了自行研制的圆柱形多自由度超声波电动机的结构、驱动原理和输出性能。

sentences.en: The most useful item above was probably this 15 year old ultrasonic humidifier. It produces large amounts of real fog.
sentences.cn: 上述项目中最有用的或许是这个有着15年历史的超声波增湿器，它产生大量真正的水雾。

sentences.en: The portable is a direction of the traditional type-B ultrasonic instrument, and it is the portable type-B ultrasonic.
sentences.cn: 传统的推车式B超检查仪也向便携式方向发展，于是就出现了便携式B超检查仪。

sentences.en: The relations of ultrasonic motor output characteristics and drive frequency are nonlinear.
sentences.cn: 超声波电机的输出特性与驱动频率呈非线性关系.

sentences.en: The welds passed the examination of radiographic test ( ultrasonic inspection, magnetic testing ).
sentences.cn: 这焊缝通过射线透视检查 ( 超声波探伤 、 磁力探伤 ) 合格.

sentences.en: This moth's ear is tuned in to the bat's ultrasonic squeak.
sentences.cn: 这种蛾的耳朵能收听到蝙蝠的超音速的尖叫声.

words.tran_cn: 超声波检查法；超声波扫描术

phrases.tran_cn: 超声空化；超音波诱导空化
超声波除垢器；超音波清洗器
超声波清洗；超声波消磁
超声波测试；超声波探伤法

trans.tran_cn: [声]超声的，超音波的，超音速的
trans.tran_en: (of sounds) higher than humans can hear
